channel.title: Talks on Ignasi Barrera
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Ignasi Barrera

item.title: Talks
item.description: Here are some of the talks I’ve delivered recently and in the past few years. All the slides for my talks can be found in Speaker Deck. Next Generation Access Control for the Multi-Cloud World Service Mesh Day San Francisco, 2019 NGAC is a fundamental reworking of traditional access control into a form suited to the needs of the modern, distributed, interconnected enterprise. NGAC is based on a flexible infrastructure that can provide access control services for a number of different types of resources, accessed by a number of different types of applications and users.
